text: Sutan Bhatoegana Siregar (13 September 1957 â€“ 19 November 2016) was an Indonesian politician of the Democratic Party. Sutan was a member of the People's Representative Council from 2009-2014. Sultan was elected in the legislative elections from the first North Sumatra electoral district. He received votes from Medan, Deli Serdang, Serdang Badagai, and Tebing Tinggi by the Democratic Party. Sutan was one of the founders of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians Category:Batak people
title: Sutan Bhatoegana
